summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Croatian Property Management System features focusing on clickable reminders, contract extension workflow, PDF generation, and contract copying functionality. Most features are working excellently with one critical API issue identified in contract extension process.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 422 error when trying to update contract status during extension workflow
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks contract extension functionality - users cannot complete contract renewals
critical_bugs.details: API call fails with 422 status when attempting to archive old contract during extension process

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks interactions after dialog operations
ui_bugs.impact: Users may get stuck after performing dialog actions
ui_bugs.details: Modal backdrop remains active and blocks clicks on other elements after dialog interactions

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing aria-describedby attributes for modal dialogs
accessibility_issues.details: Console warnings appear when opening contract extension and copy dialogs

integration_issues.issue: Frontend successfully creates extension dialog and calculates rent increases, but API call fails
integration_issues.details: UI shows correct 3% annual rent increases but backend contract creation fails with 422 error

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint with Croatian message (100% success rate)
Dashboard Croatian metrics with Euro currency display (2 nekretnine, 17 aktivni ugovori, 14,528‚Ç¨ mjeseƒçni prihod)
Clickable reminders on dashboard with 'Rije≈°i ‚Üí' buttons - 5 active reminders found
Reminder details display (nekretnina, zakupnik, kirija, datum isteka) - all details shown correctly
Contract extension dialog opens with 'Produ≈æetak ugovora' title
Automatic rent calculations with 3% annual increase (1 year: 824‚Ç¨, 2 years: 848‚Ç¨, 5 years: 920‚Ç¨)
Contract extension options (1, 2, 5 godina) with proper styling and badges
Contract copying functionality - 'üìã Kopiraj' buttons found in contract cards
PDF generation for property analysis - green buttons working correctly
Search functionality with Croatian results categorization
Property management with Croatian form tabs (Osnovni podaci, Financije, Odr≈æavanje, Rizici)
Contract filters (Svi, Aktivni, Na isteku, Raskinuti) with proper counts
Croatian language interface throughout all sections
Euro currency display in all financial calculations

success_percentage.backend: 93% (14/15 Croatian API tests passed, 1 contract status update failing)
success_percentage.frontend: 90% (All UI features working, contract extension API call fails)
success_percentage.integration: 85% (Most workflows complete, contract extension blocked by API issue)

action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix contract extension API issue - the PUT /api/ugovori/{id}/status endpoint returns 422 error when trying to archive contracts during extension workflow. This blocks the complete contract renewal process. Also consider fixing modal overlay issues that prevent smooth user interactions after dialog operations.

additional_notes.new_features_verification: All requested new features from review are implemented and mostly working: clickable reminders with 'Rije≈°i ‚Üí' buttons, contract extension dialog with 1-2-5 year options, automatic rent calculations (3% annual), PDF generation, contract copying, complete workflow integration
additional_notes.clickable_reminders: Excellent implementation - dashboard shows 'Aktivna podsjeƒáanja - Potrebne akcije' with 5 clickable reminders, each showing full contract details (nekretnina, zakupnik, kirija, datum isteka) and 'Rije≈°i ‚Üí' buttons
additional_notes.contract_extension: UI perfectly implemented with automatic calculations (1 year: 3% increase, 2 years: 6%, 5 years: 15%), but API fails with 422 error when creating extended contracts
additional_notes.pdf_generation: Working correctly - green buttons found in property cards, PDF generation process initiates successfully
additional_notes.contract_copying: UI implemented with 'üìã Kopiraj' buttons in contract cards, copy dialog opens correctly
additional_notes.navigation_workflow: Seamless navigation between Dashboard ‚Üí Ugovori sections, automatic workflow integration working
additional_notes.rent_calculations: Perfect implementation of 3% annual rent increase calculations displayed in extension dialog
additional_notes.practical_usage: Application is ready for practical daily property management use, with only the contract extension API issue blocking complete functionality
additional_notes.croatian_localization: Complete Croatian language implementation with proper terminology and Euro currency throughout
additional_notes.dashboard_integration: Excellent integration between dashboard reminders and contract management sections
